meanings.definition: To become or convert into pyrite.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the rock will pyritise and turn into shiny pyrite.
meanings.sent2: The mineral slowly pyritises, changing its composition.
meanings.sent3: Why did the mineral decide to pyritise? To become a sparkling gem!
meanings.sent4: Her heart seemed to pyritise, hardening with each disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The process of pyritising the metal made it gleam like gold.

meanings.definition: To impregnate or mix with pyrite.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler will pyritise the necklace to give it a unique look.
meanings.sent2: It is common to pyritise certain stones to enhance their appearance.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to pyritise the dish with a sprinkle of pyrite dust.
meanings.sent4: The artist's creativity seemed to pyritise everything it touched.
meanings.sent5: The potion was pyritised, giving it a magical shimmer.
